name: shravs-teleradiology-admin
description: Shravs Admin Dashboard with Supabase Edge Functions

scripts.db:migrate:reset: psql -c "DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA public;" "postgresql://postgres:Shravs@20256@db.xksqdjwbiojwyfllwtvh.supabase.co:5432/postgres" && npm run db:migrate
scripts.db:status: psql "postgresql://postgres:Shravs@20256@db.xksqdjwbiojwyfllwtvh.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'public';"
